objects.name: message
objects.string: Move the character by pressing the arrow keys or click with the mouse

events.comment:
at the beginning of the scene, set the Z order (depth) of the bottom and top part of each tree using their Y position. 
In this case the top part need to be higher to avoid the player appear between the bottom and the top part

set the Z order (depth) of the player using it Y position, in this case we need to subtract 10 to make sure it stay behind the top part of the tree
We set the Z order only if any key or the mouse is pressed (the character move)
move the character if the mouse is pressed
